content.body: I know this is a very very old topic. Whatever happens to const parameters? function f(const a){}. I might need that as an assumption to one of my ideas, but was it not possible? It seems straightforward, but I feel like I'm missing some technical issue perhaps that stopped it from being put in when const was.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I know this is a very very old topic. Whatever happens to const parameters? function f(const a){}. I might need that as an assumption to one of my ideas, but was it not possible? It seems straightforward, but I feel like I'm missing some technical issue perhaps that stopped it from being put in when const was.

content.body: I sometimes like it, but it really isn't easy to encourage people to use it.

content.body: It's been 2 weeks since the TC39 meeting, time for Notes to be published?

content.body:
Question about Annex B.3.4 (https://tc39.es/ecma262/#sec-variablestatements-in-catch-blocks):

Why does the text before the note only modify `var`, while the text after the note also modifies `function`?
